metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to entering the dorms in the creche. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load up CRE_Main_Ago to 1313; -2; -824the AD will play

0.speaker: Player
0.text: So githyanki sleep in beds too. How conventional.
